name: Digital Spy - Teal-17
description:
This is my first attempt at a Stylish style sheet from scratch
and is in response to the new Digital Spy Forum
and the outcry from some that it is too bright.

Though the choice of colour scheme may not suit all
it is my best first try and has been well commented to assist
others who might want to have a go at improving it.
additional_info:
The biggest thing I am not happy with is the lists of threads.
Ideally, I would have set it so that the background was all 
the same dull green colour, without the flash when you hover
but I couldn't fathom out how to do it.
The alternative would have been the original bright white.
I have indicated in the commenting where this is controlled so that
you can fiddle with it if you wish
